title: Robe, early 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: couched cord and satin stitch embroidery; lined
description: Robe with short sleeves made of ribbed pink silk embroidered in white silk (satin stitch) and couched cord in design of open flowers and scrolling leaves; lined with blue silk; one tie of pink silk, (others missing).

tombstone.epitaph:
Robe, early 18th century.Medium: silk
Technique: couched cord and satin stitch embroidery; lined. 1941-100-4.
